MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-APR-2021 17:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Wardle, Nantwich affecting properties in Green Lane and surrounding areas. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we now expect the power to be restored by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:47PM on 13th April 2021.
